Articles.Content:
Yellow Dart's

![tmsxXmo.png](http://i.imgur.com/tmsxXmo.png)

Flags & Art

I just wanted a place to put all the flags I've made so far, mainly for the "Request a Flag" thread, if anyone else is interested in using them (I'm leaving out the more specific requested flags that aren't very creative and/or are less likely to be of use to someone else). I've included the original, larger sizes as well because it is nicer to look at; 256x160 is pretty tiny. I also made a Valentina's Day Contest submission that I was pretty proud of so I wanted to post that here too. I'll try to put any flags I make in the future here too, if I remember.

First, here is my Valentina Art Contest submission, featuring Val and Jeb. It turned out a millions times better than I expected, since the sketch I was working off of was made in about 10 minutes or less, and I've also never really done anything like this, starting completely from scratch. Usually I am working from a photo or something. If you like it, by all means **voice your opinion** in the official contest thread [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/110612-Valentina-s-Day-community-contest/page16). A very hires version can be found [here](http://i.imgur.com/MVFtinB.jpg) if you want to see all the little details I put into it, or play Wheres Waldo with the mistakes I made.

 **"Kapture the Flag"** 

![Q5goDwK.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Q5goDwK.jpg)

**Flags**

Rocket Capsule

This is the first flag I made for KSP. It is still my favorite but I seem to have lost the larger version of it.

![5kFRhLf.png](http://i.imgur.com/5kFRhLf.png)

Konstellation Series

Made for Superpowasonik

3 versions of a flag based on the emblem for NASA's cancelled Constellation Program.

![2KkhJaD.png](http://i.imgur.com/2KkhJaD.png)

![EWfpfz7.png](http://i.imgur.com/EWfpfz7.png)

![pevWp3J.png](http://i.imgur.com/pevWp3J.png)

![CcUQsvH.png](http://i.imgur.com/CcUQsvH.png)

![N6Bc5bw.png](http://i.imgur.com/N6Bc5bw.png)

![ufceOHt.png](http://i.imgur.com/ufceOHt.png)

Lathe & Jool

Made for DMSP

A flag with Lathe Floating in front of a field of swirly Jool.

![YP9QdQf.png](http://i.imgur.com/YP9QdQf.png)

![g5cwnew.png](http://i.imgur.com/g5cwnew.png)

Eeloo Star

Made for DMSP

Eeloo with a star/ship going to it. Requester wanted it to stay simple/cartoonish.

![IIXCfXN.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/IIXCfXN.jpg)

![OMdvR2Y.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/OMdvR2Y.jpg)

Albatross

Made for Sampa

The requester wanted a flag for an epic explorer and the Wandering Albatross seemed like the best way to convey that idea. This is probably my second favorite of the ones I've made so far.

![Jq1bNu7.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/Jq1bNu7.jpg)

![sr8Owg5.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/sr8Owg5.jpg)

RomaKerbal

Made for r4pt0r

This is supposed to look like a mix of the Roman Empire and KSP.

![OU5POdY.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/OU5POdY.jpg)

![JMCup79.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/JMCup79.jpg)

Eagle

Made for Superpowasonik

Just a flag with a bird on it. The bird is based off Panem's flag/emblem but with the wings changed.

![a5dIFKZ.png](http://i.imgur.com/a5dIFKZ.png)

![YorVSme.png](http://i.imgur.com/YorVSme.png)

Halo Paw

Made for SelectHalfling0

An enlarged and improved version of the requester's Halo Clan emblem.

![vLQP8Ug.png](http://i.imgur.com/vLQP8Ug.png)

![czlMGgk.png](http://i.imgur.com/czlMGgk.png)

Rocket Portugal

Made for Eunito

A kerbalized version of the flag of Portugal, with a golden, decoupling Saturn V.

![h2Rjdrz.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/h2Rjdrz.jpg)

![NgOvXqm.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/NgOvXqm.jpg)

Kpain

Made for EpsilonGalactic

A kerbalized version of the flag of Spain, along with a flag that is just the Coat of Arms over transparency. Spain's motto means "The Great Beyond" which is about as kerbal as you could ever hope for in a motto.

![Rku2qzt.png](http://i.imgur.com/Rku2qzt.png)

![P7RM22I.png](http://i.imgur.com/P7RM22I.png)

![VAaBm6W.png](http://i.imgur.com/VAaBm6W.png)

![qQazahz.png](http://i.imgur.com/qQazahz.png)

Mobius

Made for Zodiak

A simple mobius strip design, based on Zodiak's original design.

![RPoH6gS.png](http://i.imgur.com/RPoH6gS.png)

![t8ay0yG.png](http://i.imgur.com/t8ay0yG.png)

Bebop

Looking back through some non-KSP related art today, I saw this and thought it would make a cool flag for any Cowboy Bebop fans out there.

![MvbF4ga.png](http://i.imgur.com/MvbF4ga.png)

![g3LgRlc.png](http://i.imgur.com/g3LgRlc.png)

Kerbalkind

Made for MrWalrus123

A flag meant to represent all of Kerbalkind.

![PDL5N4y.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/PDL5N4y.jpg)

![QP5Qyou.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/QP5Qyou.jpg)

Thanks for looking!

P.S. The top flag is me on Wipeout in my teddy sweater vest. 2011, Hotties vs. Nerds.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-24T22:07:36Z" title="02/24/2015 10:07  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 24, 2015</time> by The Yellow Dart**

Nice flags.

Wait what? You were on Wipeout? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

Awesome!
feel free to post the flags you made for me
The Laythe flag is epic, my first craft with it is arriving shortly. It is a mapping rover, so there will be a lot of flags! Thanks again!
Wipeout? Awesome. KSP Flags? Awesome.
I got request, can you do a Constellation style flag with Kerbin, Mun, Duna and Jool? Thanks.

> 
> Wait what? You were on Wipeout?

Yeah, can you guess which team I was on? ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

I tried finding a video to link to but the only videos that weren't pay-per-episode only showed the Hotties team. I can't imagine why.

Added Eeloo Star below Lathe & Jool and Bebop to the end. Bebop is from Cowboy Bebop, the [name and number](http://www.topanimeseriesz.com/images/cowboy-bebop/cowboy-bebop-characters/jet-black-cowboy-bebop/cowboy-bebop-ship.jpg) on the side of the main ship.

> 
> I got request, can you do a Constellation style flag with Kerbin, Mun, Duna and Jool? Thanks.

Sure, you are second in line, I'll get to it pretty soon.

> 
> Nice flags.
> Wait what? You were on Wipeout? ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> Awesome!

> 
> Yeah, can you guess which team I was on? ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
> I tried finding a video to link to but the only videos that weren't pay-per-episode only showed the Hotties team. I can't imagine why.

I love Wipeout! My mom hates it! You can imagine the tension on Sunday evenings...

Added a new flag made for MrWalrus123, Kerbalkind, to the end.

> 
> I love Wipeout! My mom hates it! You can imagine the tension on Sunday evenings...

How can anyone hate Wipeout? Who doesn't love big balls?
I have no idea why my mom dislikes this show, she has just made it clear that she does! ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

These are amazing! The Cowboy Bebop flag hits me right in the feels too ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif). Very nicely done. I may want to ask you for a flag if you'd be so inclined as to acquiesce. It'd be a letter H in a style I've been experimenting with.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-27T16:19:50Z" title="02/27/2015 04:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 27, 2015</time> by Avera9eJoe**

> 
> These are amazing! The Cowboy Bebop flag hits me right in the feels too ![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif). Very nicely done. I may want to ask you for a flag if you'd be so inclined as to acquiesce. It'd be a letter H in a style I've been experimenting with.

Can do, just let me know what you're looking for and I'll get to it.
I'm gonna steal that bird insignia if you don't mind.

Let's get right to business then... This shouldn't be all that hard for you as I only really want a logo, not a flag. I drew these pictures about a month ago when I was thinking of what logo I wanted for HafCo., the company name I usually use.

The logo to the upper right is what I think I like the most. Just a simple icon that I can slap on anything at any angle and have it look good. 

![4m8IqsP.png](http://i.imgur.com/4m8IqsP.png)

Color scheme would be something to the effect of this. Darker blue rim with a lighter blue middle. Probably with more contrast though ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif).

![Cq7lYIT.png](http://i.imgur.com/Cq7lYIT.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-28T06:33:02Z" title="02/28/2015 06:33  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 28, 2015</time> by Avera9eJoe**

> 
> I'm gonna steal that bird insignia if you don't mind.

Oh, the one from my request? Go ahead! I am NEVER gonna hold back a design if someone likes it as well!

Oh one thing I failed to realize. This logo design I was going for is very similar to a clothing brand logo. Make sure to include the "-" in-between the sides of the H. And do what you want with color scheme too.
Hello! If you don't have the time to work on my logo, no problem. I was just thinking I should've asked the flag building page anyhoo!

> 
> Hello! If you don't have the time to work on my logo, no problem. I was just thinking I should've asked the flag building page anyhoo!

be patient...he could be working on your flag now, but you cannot rush quality

Once more, another flag to be raised! I'm desperate for some stuff within my game. So, can you get to work on a flag for my program: KSXA (Kerbal Space eXploration Administration.) and one for my Argus MPCV, transparent and non-transparent please.

Edit: do the KSXA flag ESA style.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-18T22:37:45Z" title="03/18/2015 10:37  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 18, 2015</time> by TheZenGuy**

> 
> be patient...he could be working on your flag now, but you cannot rush quality

Indeed you cannot. I run my own YouTube channel and I've learned the hard truth of those words...

Sorry about the wait, real life is blowing up right now, getting ready for my wife's ETS from the Air Force and a cross-country move with kids. Plus I was spending so much time in photoshop the last few weeks with flags and the art contest that I started to miss actually playing KSP (space engine as well). I have no ETA for you at present. We move this week and since my laptop screen is broken and I require a separate monitor and keyboard setup to do anything I don't know when I will be up and running again.

I knocked this out in about half an hour, if it isn't quite what you were looking for feel free to post what you want changed and I will get to it when I can.

![rwOnjdc.png](http://i.imgur.com/rwOnjdc.png)

![edG7H7B.png](http://i.imgur.com/edG7H7B.png)

It looks spiffy! I may end up removing the blue seal and go with just the red center. I didn't know it would look so awesome in red! No need to edit more. Thanks a ton. Rep!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-15T08:01:08Z" title="03/15/2015 08:01  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 15, 2015</time> by Avera9eJoe**

Great work. Very funky.

I liked your flag that you produced for MrWalrus123. Did you whip up the static silhouette of the Kerbal?

Peace.
